description: CIF core defines the universal signal-to-skill capability intelligence used across education, employment, and lifelong learning contexts.

signals.description: Observable behavioural and cognitive signals derived from responses or observations

skills.description: Stable human capabilities derived from weighted signal combinations

skill_narratives.description: Human-readable strength and growth narratives mapped to skill bands

fit_bands.description: Standardised interpretation bands for skill and role fit

design_principles: Signals and skills are universal and context-independent
Roles, pathways, and learning programs are contextual overlays
CIF does not predict outcomes; it assesses capability readiness
Narratives emphasise strengths and growth, not deficits
Core intelligence is separate from display and delivery layers
